title: Educational Humor Utilization Strategies for Science English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English vocabulary in science and basic communication skills
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous science English learning course using smartphones and LMS, emphasizing increased interest and engagement in English learning through humor, with project-based assessment to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three or more appropriate humor types (wordplay, short stories, situational jokes) within a science English classroom context.
Learners can create English presentation materials using humor linked to science concepts and incorporate feedback through peer evaluation.
Learners can present two or more considerations (e.g., cultural differences, audience characteristics) when using educational humor in online discussion forums.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
